description: This JavaScript source file defines functions for constructing a styled Word document (DOCX) using the 'docx' library. It includes utilities for processing schema data, formatting values, generating action tables, and assembling the final document, specifically for the 'Actions' section of a SOW (Statement of Work) document, excluding 'Work Order Parameters'. It also provides utility functions for constructing filenames and label formatting.

methods.name: normalizeLabel(label)
methods.description: Normalizes a label into a stable key-like identifier.

methods.name: cleanValue(v)
methods.description: Cleans and trims display values, removing placeholder underscores.

methods.name: toProfessionalLabel(keyOrLabel)
methods.description: Converts schema keys into human-readable labels in title case.

methods.name: formatValue(v)
methods.description: Formats various types of values for display, handling objects and arrays.

methods.name: isWorkOrderParametersSectionName(name)
methods.description: Checks if a section name matches 'Work Order Parameters'.

methods.name: buildOrderedActionFields(templateSchema = {}, templateData = {})
methods.description: Builds an ordered list of action fields from schema, excluding 'Work Order Parameters'.

methods.name: getByPath(obj, path, fallback = "")
methods.description: Retrieves a nested value from an object using a dotted path.

methods.name: buildActionsTable({ templateSchema, templateData })
methods.description: Constructs a styled table of actions for inclusion in the DOCX document.

methods.name: buildHeader()
methods.description: Constructs an empty header section for the document.

methods.name: buildFooter()
methods.description: Constructs an empty footer section for the document.

methods.name: buildSowDocx(data, templateSchema)
methods.description: Main function to build the DOCX blob containing the 'Actions' section based on provided data and schema.

methods.name: makeSowDocxFilename(data)
methods.description: Generates a filename for the SOW DOCX, incorporating client, title, and date.

methods.name: makeCell( children, { widthPct, vAlign = VerticalAlign.TOP, padding = 200, opts = {}, shaded = false } = {} )
para( text, { bold = false, size = 22, align = AlignmentType.LEFT, after = 160 } = {} )
